product_name: CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP Front Bike Light
long_description: Throwing a powerful 1,700 lumens of light in a compact, lightweight design, the CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP front bike light offers smart customization to meet your nighttime riding needs. With 2 superbright Cree LEDs, up to 1,700 lumens of light is at your disposal to illuminate the road, path or trail ahead; light is optimized to illuminate both wide and far. OSP (On-Site Programmable) technology means you can set brightness levels and customize light flash speeds to suit your needs; all with the push of the button while riding. 4 total brightness and 4 special settings: boost, high, medium and low along with SteadyPulse(TM), day flash, slow flash and walking. SteadyPulse illumination mode combines steady brightness with an alerting flash, letting you see what's ahead of you while also letting others know you're present. Water-resistant aluminum casing helps ensure lasting performance. Illuminated display indicates which light setting is in use and a battery indicator displays level of remaining power; buttons are on top of light for quick and easy use. Slim, rechargeable lithium ion battery lasts 2 hrs. on the highest setting and up to 32 hrs. on low; battery can be mounted on the frame or tucked in a backpack. The CygoLite Centauri 1700 OSP bike light has a tool-free handlebar mount; also includes a quick-release helmet mount. Comes with head unit, battery, wall charger, handlebar and helmet mounts, and a 2 ft. extension cable. Battery weighs 260g and light weighs 150g for a total of 410g.
